newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - May 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - May 23.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- The African Development Bank, which holds its annual meeting in Abidjan next week, has restored its credibilty and its president Omar Kabbaj says it intends to take part in the development of the private sector.
- Ivorian tobacco company CAITACI is increasing its prices from 280 CFA per kilo to 300 Cfa per kilo because of the high demand from the United States.
